com.qtplaf.library.database

Class Value

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qtplaf.library.database.Value
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<java.lang.Object>

    public class Value
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<java.lang.Object>
    A generic container for a value of different types. Valid types for a Value are Boolean, String, Decimal, Double, Integer, Long, Date, Time, Timestamp, ByteArray. Note that other types will be included uppon need.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas

      • getDecimals

        public int getDecimals()
        Returns the number of decimal places. If it is not a number it throws an unsupported operation exception, otherwise it returns the number of decimal places, 0 or greater if it is a big decimal, 0 if it is an integer or a long, and -1 if it is a double.
        Returns:
        The number of decimal places.
